Function.name: appendElement
Function.description: Adds a new element at the end of a dynamic array. This method has no effect on a static array.

Function.name: clear
Function.description: Removes all elements in a dynamic array. Sets all elements to NULL in a static array.

Function.name: deleteElement
Function.description: Removes an element at the given position. In a static or dynamic array, the elements after the given position are moved up. In a dynamic array, the number of elements is decremented by 1.

Function.name: getLength
Function.description: Returns the length of a one-dimensional array.

Function.name: insertElement
Function.description: Inserts a new element at the given position. In a static or dynamic array, the elements after the given position are moved down. In a dynamic array, the number of elements increments by 1.

Function.name: append
Function.description: Returns a new string made by adding part to the end of the current string.

Function.name: equals
Function.description: Returns TRUE if the string passed as parameters matches the current string. If one of the strings is NULL the method returns FALSE.

Function.name: equalsIgnoreCase
Function.description: Returns TRUE if the string passed as parameters matches the current string, ignoring character case. If one of the strings is NULL the method returns FALSE.

Function.name: getCharAt
Function.description: Returns the character at the position pos (starts at 1). The unit for character positions depend on the length semantics. In BLS, the method returns NULL if pos does not match a valid character-byte position in the current string.

Function.name: getIndexOf
Function.description: Returns the position of the substring part in the current string, starting from position spos. The unit for character positions depend on the length semantics used. Returns zero if the substring was not found. Returns -1 if string is NULL.

Function.name: getLength
Function.description: Returns the lenfth of the string, including trailing blanks (Note that the LENGTH() built-in function ignores trailing blanks). The unit for character length depend on the length semantics used.

Function.name: subString
Function.description: Returns the substring starting at position spos and ending at epos. The unit for character positions depend on the length semantics used. In BLS, returns NULL if the positions do not delimit a valid substring in the current string.

Function.name: toLowerCase
Function.description: Converts the current string to lowercase. Returns NULL if the string is null.

Function.name: toUpperCase
Function.description: Converts the current string to uppercase. Returns NULL if the string is null.

Function.name: trim
Function.description: Removes white space characters from the beginning and end of the current string. Returns NULL if the string is null.

Function.name: trimLeft
Function.description: Removes white space characters from the beginning of the current string. Returns NULL if the string is null.

Function.name: trimRight
Function.description: Removes white space characters from the end of the current string. Returns NULL if the string is null.

Function.name: readFile
Function.description: Reads data from a file and copies into memory or to the file used by the variables according to the LOCATE statement issued on the object.

Function.name: writeFile
Function.description: Writes data from the variable (memory or source file) to the destination file passed as parameter. The file is created if it does not exist.

Method.desc: Returns the prefix for a DomNode object.

Method.name: isAttached
Method.desc: Returns whether the node is attached to the XML document.

Method.name: setNodeValue
Method.desc: Sets the node value for a DomNode object.

Method.name: setPrefix
Method.desc: Sets the prefix for a DomNode object.

Method.name: toString
Method.desc: Returns a string representation of a DomNode object.

Method.name: hasAttribute
Method.desc: Checks whether an XML Element DomNode object has the XML Attribute specified by a specified name.

Method.name: hasAttributeNS
Method.desc: Checks whether a namespace qualified XML Attribute of a given name is carried by an XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: getAttributeNode
Method.desc: Returns an XML Attribute DomNode object for an XML Element DomNode object

Method.name: getAttributeNodeNS
Method.desc: Returns a namespace-qualified XML Attribute DomNode object for an XML Element DomNode object

Method.name: setAttributeNode
Method.desc: Sets (or resets) an XML Attribute DomNode object to an XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: setAttributeNodeNS
Method.desc: Sets (or resets) a namespace-qualified XML Attribute DomNode object to an XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: getAttribute
Method.desc: Returns the value of an XML Attribute for an XML Element DomNode object

Method.name: getAttributeNS
Method.desc: Returns the value of a namespace qualified XML Attribute for an XML Element DomNode object

Method.name: setAttribute
Method.desc: Sets (or resets) an XML Attribute for an XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: setAttributeNS
Method.desc: Sets (or resets) a namespace-qualified XML Attribute for an XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: setIdAttribute
Method.desc: Declare (or undeclare) the XML Attribute of given name to be of type ID.

Method.name: setIdAttributeNS
Method.desc: Declare (or undeclare) the namespace-qualified XML Attribute of given name and namespace to be of type ID.

Method.name: removeAttribute
Method.desc: Removes an XML Attribute for an XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: removeAttributeNS
Method.desc: Removes a namespace qualified XML Attribute for an XML Element DomNode object

Method.name: hasAttributes
Method.desc: Identifies whether a node has XML Attribute nodes.

Method.name: getArributesCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of XML Attribute DomNode objects on this XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: getAttributeNodeItem
Method.desc: Returns the XML Attribute DomNode object at a given position on this XML Element DomNode object.

Method.name: selectByXPath
Method.desc: Returns a DomNodeList object containing all DomNode objects matching an XPath 1.0 expression.

Method.name: getElementsByTagName
Method.desc: Returns a DomNodeList object containing all XML Element DomNode objects with the same tag name.

Method.name: getElementsByTagNameNS
Method.desc: Returns a DomNodeList object containing all namespace-qualified XML Element DomNode objects with the same tag name and namespace.

Method.name: isDefaultNamespace
Method.desc: Checks whether the specified namespace URI is the default namespace.

Method.name: lookupNamespaceURI
Method.desc: Looks up the namespace URI associated to a prefix, starting from a specified node.

Method.name: lookupPrefix
Method.desc: Looks up the prefix associated to a namespace URI, starting from the specified node.

Method.name: getCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of DomNode objects in a DomNodeList object.

Method.name: getItem
Method.desc: Returns the DomNode object at a given position in a DomNodeList object.

Method.name: create
Method.desc: Constructor of a StaxWriter object.

Method.name: setFeature
Method.desc: Sets a feature of a StaxWriter object.

Method.name: getFeature
Method.desc: Gets a feature of a StaxWriter object.

Method.name: writeTo
Method.desc: Sets the output stream of the StaxWriter object to a file or an URL, and starts the streaming.

Method.name: writeToDocument
Method.desc: Sets the output stream of the StaxWriter object to an xml.DomDocument object, and starts the streaming.

Method.name: writeToText
Method.desc: Sets the output stream of the StaxWriter object to a TEXT large object, and starts the streaming.

Method.name: writeToPipe
Method.desc: Sets the output stream of the StaxWriter object to a PIPE, and starts the streaming.

Method.name: close
Method.desc: Closes the StaxWriter streaming, and releases all associated resources.

Method.name: startDocument
Method.desc: Writes an XML declaration to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: endDocument
Method.desc: Closes any open tags and writes corresponding end tags.

Method.name: dtd
Method.desc: Writes a DTD to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: setPrefix
Method.desc: Binds a namespace URI to a prefix.

Method.name: setDefaultNamespace
Method.desc: Binds a namespace URI to the default namespace.

Method.name: declareNamespace
Method.desc: Binds a namespace URI to a prefix, and forces the output of the XML namespace definition to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: declareDefaultNamespace
Method.desc: Binds a namespace URI to the default namespace, and forces the output of the default XML namespace definition to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: startElement
Method.desc: Writes an XML start element to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: emptyElement
Method.desc: Writes an empty XML element to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: startElementNS
Method.desc: Writes a namespace-qualified XML start element to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: emptyElementNS
Method.desc: Writes an empty namespace qualified XML element to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: endElement
Method.desc: Writes an end tag to the StaxWriter stream relying on the internal state to determine the prefix and local name of the last START_ELEMENT.

Method.name: attribute
Method.desc: Writes an XML attribute to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: attributeNS
Method.desc: Writes an XML namespace qualified attribute to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: processingInstruction
Method.desc: Writes an XML ProcessingInstruction to the StaxWriter stream

Method.name: comment
Method.desc: Writes an XML comment to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: characters
Method.desc: Writes an XML text to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: cdata
Method.desc: Writes an XML CData to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: entityRef
Method.desc: Writes an XML EntityReference to the StaxWriter stream.

Method.name: Create
Method.desc: Constructor of a StaxReader object.

Method.name: setFeature
Method.desc: Sets a feature of a StaxReader object.

Method.name: getFeature
Method.desc: Gets a feature of a StaxReader object.

Method.name: readFrom
Method.desc: Sets the input stream of the StaxReader object to a file or an URL and starts the streaming

Method.name: readFromDocument
Method.desc: Sets the input stream of the StaxReader object to a DomDocument object and starts the streaming

Method.name: readFromText
Method.desc: Sets the input stream of the StaxReader object to a TEXT large object and starts the streaming.

Method.name: readFromPipe
Method.desc: Sets the input stream of the StaxReader object to a PIPE and starts the streaming.

Method.name: close
Method.desc: Closes the StaxReader streaming and releases all associated resources.

Method.name: getEventType
Method.desc: Returns a string that indicates the type of event the cursor of the StaxReader object is pointing to.

Method.name: hasName
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to a node with a name.

Method.name: hasText
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to a node with a text value.

Method.name: isEmptyElement
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to an empty element node.

Method.name: isStartElement
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to a start element node.

Method.name: isEndElement
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to an end element node.

Method.name: isCharacters
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to a text node.

Method.name: isIgnorableWhitespace
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor points to ignorable whitespace.

Method.name: getEncoding
Method.desc: Returns the document encoding defined in the XML Document declaration, or NULL.

Method.name: getVersion
Method.desc: Returns the document version defined in the XML Document declaration, or NULL.

Method.name: isStandalone
Method.desc: Checks whether the document standalone attribute defined in the XML Document declaration is set to yes.

Method.name: standaloneSet
Method.desc: Checks whether the document standalone attribute is defined in the XML Document declaration.

Method.name: getPrefix
Method.desc: Returns the prefix of the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getLocalName
Method.desc: Returns the local name of the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getName
Method.desc: Returns the qualified name of the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getNamespace
Method.desc: Returns the namespace URI of the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getText
Method.desc: Returns as a string the value of the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getPITarget
Method.desc: Returns the target part of an XML ProcessingInstruction node, or NULL.

Method.name: getPIData
Method.desc: Returns the data part of an XML ProcessingInstruction node, or NULL.

Method.name: getAttributeCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of XML attributes defined on the current XML node, or zero.

Method.name: getAttributeLocalName
Method.desc: Returns the local name of an XML attribute defined at a given position on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getAttributeNamespace
Method.desc: Returns the namespace URI of an XML attribute defined at a given position on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getAttributePrefix
Method.desc: Returns the prefix of an XML attribute defined at a given position on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getAttributeValue
Method.desc: Returns the value of an XML attribute defined at a given position on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: findAttributeValue
Method.desc: Returns the value of an XML attribute of a given name and/or namespace on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: lookupNamespace
Method.desc: Looks up the namespace URI associated with a given prefix starting from the current XML node the StaxReader cursor is pointing to.

Method.name: lookupPrefix
Method.desc: Looks up the prefix associated with a given namespace URI, starting from the current XML node the StaxReader cursor is pointing to.

Method.name: getNamespaceCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of namespace declarations defined on the current XML node, or zero.

Method.name: getNamespacePrefix
Method.desc: Returns the prefix of a namespace declaration defined at a given position on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: getNamespaceURI
Method.desc: Returns the URI of a namespace declaration defined at a given position on the current XML node, or NULL.

Method.name: hasNext
Method.desc: Checks whether the StaxReader cursor can be moved to a XML node next to it.

Method.name: next
Method.desc: Moves the StaxReader cursor to the next XML node.

Method.name: nextTag
Method.desc: Moves the StaxReader cursor to the next XML open or end tag

Method.name: nextSibling
Method.desc: Moves the StaxReader cursor to the immediate next sibling XML Element of the current node, skipping all its child nodes.

Method.name: SetOption
Method.desc: Sets a global option value for the serializer engine

Method.name: GetOption
Method.desc: Gets a global option value from the serializer engine.

Method.name: VariableToStax
Method.desc: Serializes a 4GL variable into an XML element node using a StaxWriter object.

Method.name: StaxToVariable
Method.desc: Serializes an XML element node into a 4GL variable using a StaxReader object.

Method.name: VariableToDom
Method.desc: Serializes a 4GL variable into an XML element node using a DomNode object.

Method.name: DomToVariable
Method.desc: Serializes an XML element node into a 4GL variable using a DomNode object.

Method.name: VariableToSoapSection5
Method.desc: Serializes a 4GL variable into an XML element node in Soap Section 5 encoding.

Method.name: SoapSection5ToVariable
Method.desc: Serializes an XML element node into a 4GL variable in Soap Section 5 encoding.

Method.name: DomToStax
Method.desc: Serializes an XML node object to a StaxWriter object.

Method.name: StaxToDom
Method.desc: Serializes an XML element node into a DomNode object using a StaxReader object.

Method.name: CreateXmlSchemas
Method.desc: Creates XML schemas corresponding to the given variable var, and fills the dynamic array ar with xml.DomDocument objects each representing an XML schema.

Method.name: Create
Method.desc: Initializes an xml.CryptoKey object. Constructor of an empty CryptoKey object depending on a url.

Method.name: CreateFromNode
Method.desc: Constructor of a new CryptoKey object depending on a url and from a XML node, according to the XML-Signature and XML-Encryption specification.

Method.name: CreateDerivedKey
Method.desc: Constructor of an empty CryptoKey object intended to be derived before use, and depending on a url.

Method.name: getUrl
Method.desc: Returns the key identifier as an URL, as defined in the XML-Signature and XML-Encryption specification.

Method.name: getType
Method.desc: Returns the type of key.

Method.name: getUsage
Method.desc: Returns the usage of the key.

Method.name: getSize
Method.desc: Returns the size of the key in bits.

Method.name: compareTo
Method.desc: Compares a CryptoKey object to a second key.

Method.name: getSHA1
Method.desc: Returns the SHA1 encoded key identifier in a base64 encoded STRING.

Method.name: setKey
Method.desc: Defines the value of a HMAC or Symmetric key.

Method.name: generateKey
Method.desc: Generates a random key of given size (in bits).

Method.name: deriveKey
Method.desc: Derives the symmetric or HMAC CryptoKey object using the given method identifier and concatenating the optional label, the mandatory seed value and the optional created date as initial random value.

Method.name: computeKey
Method.desc: Computes the shared secret based on the given modulus, generator, the private key and the other peer's public key. The returned key can be any of symmetric/HMAC or symmetric/encryption key type. It can be used for symmetric signature or symmetric encryption.

Method.name: loadBIN
Method.desc: Loads a symmetric or HMAC key from a file in raw format.

Method.name: loadDER
Method.desc: Loads an asymmetric DSA key, an asymmetric RSA key or Diffie-Hellman parameters from a file in DER format.

Method.name: loadPEM
Method.desc: Loads an asymmetric DSA key, an asymmetric RSA key or Diffie-Hellman parameters from a file in PEM format.

Method.name: loadFromString
Method.desc: Loads the given key in BASE64 string format into a CryptoKey object.

Method.name: loadPrivate
Method.desc: Loads the private asymmetric RSA key in the given XML document into the private part of this CryptoKey object, according to the XKMS2.0 specification.

Method.name: loadPublic
Method.desc: Loads the public asymmetric RSA or DSA key in the given XML document into the public part of this CryptoKey object, according to the XML-Signature specification for DSA and RSA key value.

Method.name: loadPublicFromString
Method.desc: Populate the current CryptoKey object with the passed public key.

Method.name: savePrivate
Method.desc: Saves the private part of an asymmetric RSA CryptoKey object into a XML document according to the XKMS2.0 specification.

Method.name: savePublic
Method.desc: Saves the public part of an asymmetric RSA or DSA CryptoKey object or the parameters and the public key of the Diffie-Hellman object into a XML document according to the XML-Signature specification for DSA and RSA and Diffie-Hellman key values.

Method.name: savePublicToString
Method.desc: Save the current xml.CryptoKey's public part in the returned base64 string.

Method.name: saveToString
Method.desc: Saves the CryptoKey object into a BASE64 string format.

Method.name: setFeature
Method.desc: Sets or resets the value of a feature for a CryptoKey object.

Method.name: getFeature
Method.desc: Returns the value of the given feature for this CryptoKey object, or NULL.

Method.name: Create
Method.desc: Constructor of an empty CryptoX509 object.

Method.name: CreateFromNode
Method.desc: Constructor of a new CryptoX509 object from a XML X509 certificate node, according to the XML-Signature specification

Method.name: getIdentifier
Method.desc: Gets the identification part of an X509 certificate

Method.name: getThumbprintSHA1
Method.desc: Gets the SHA1 encoded thumbprint identifying this X509 certificate.

Method.name: createPublicKey
Method.desc: Creates a new public CryptoKey object for the given url, from the public key embedded in a certificate.

Method.name: loadPEM
Method.desc: Loads a X509 certificate from a file in PEM format.

Method.name: loadDER
Method.desc: Loads a X509 certificate from a file in DER format.

Method.name: save
Method.desc: Saves the CryptoX509 certificate into a XML document with ds:X509Data as root node according to the XML-Signature specification.

Method.name: saveToString
Method.desc: Saves the CryptoX509 certificate into a BASE64 string format.

Method.name: load
Method.desc: Loads the given XML document with ds:X509Data as root node according to the XML-Signature specification, into the CryptoX509 object.

Method.name: loadFromString
Method.desc: Loads the given X509 certificate in BASE64 string format into this CryptoX509 object.

Method.name: setFeature
Method.desc: Sets or resets the given feature for this CryptoX509 object.

Method.name: getFeature
Method.desc: Get the value of a given feature of a CryptoX509 object.

Method.name: Create
Method.desc: Constructor of a blank Signature object.

Method.name: CreateFromNode
Method.desc: Constructor of a new Signature object from a XML Signature node, according to the XML-Signature specification.

Method.name: RetrieveObjectDataListFromSignatureNode
Method.desc: Returns a DomNodeList containing all embedded XML nodes related to the signature object of index ind in the XML Signature node sign.

Method.name: setKey
Method.desc: Defines the key used for signing or validation.

Method.name: setCertificate
Method.desc: Defines the X509 certificate to be added to the Signature object when signing a document.

Method.name: setCanonicalization
Method.desc: Sets the canonicalization method to use for the signature.

Method.name: setID
Method.desc: Sets an ID value for the signature.

Method.name: getType
Method.desc: Returns a string with the type of the Signature object.

Method.name: getDocument
Method.desc: Returns a new DomDocument object representing the signature in XML.

Method.name: getCanonicalization
Method.desc: Returns one of the four canonicalization identifier of the signature.

Method.name: getID
Method.desc: Returns the ID value of the signature.

Method.name: getSignatureMethod
Method.desc: Returns the algorithm method of the signature.

Method.name: createReference
Method.desc: Creates a new reference that will be signed with the compute() method

Method.name: setReferenceID
Method.desc: Sets an ID value for the signature reference of index ind.

Method.name: appendReferenceTransformation
Method.desc: Appends a transformation related to the reference of index ind, and is executed before any computation

Method.name: getReferenceCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of references in this Signature object.

Method.name: getReferenceURI
Method.desc: Returns the URI of the reference of index ind in this Signature object.

Method.name: getReferenceDigest
Method.desc: Returns the digest algorithm identifier of the reference of index ind in this Signature object.

Method.name: getReferenceID
Method.desc: Returns the ID value of the reference of index ind in this Signature object, or NULL if there is none.

Method.name: getReferenceTransformationCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of transformation related to the reference of index ind.

Method.name: getReferenceTransformation
Method.desc: Gets the transformation identifier related to the reference of index ind at position pos in the list of transformation.

Method.name: createObject
Method.desc: Creates a new object that will embed additional XML nodes.

Method.name: setObjectID
Method.desc: Sets an ID value for the signature object of index ind.

Method.name: appendObjectData
Method.desc: Appends a copy of a XML node node to the signature object of index ind.

Method.name: getObjectCount
Method.desc: Returns the number of objects in this Signature object.

Method.name: getObjectID
Method.desc: Returns the ID value of the signature object of index ind in this Signature object.

Method.name: compute
Method.desc: Computes the signature of all references set in this Signature object.

Method.name: verify
Method.desc: Verifies whether all references in this Signature object haven't changed.

Method.name: signString
Method.desc: Sign the passed string according to the specified key.

Method.name: verifyString
Method.desc: Verify the signature is consistent with the given key and the original message.

Method.name: Create
Method.desc: Constructor of an Encryption object.

Method.name: EncryptString
Method.desc: Encrypts the string str using the symmetric key key, and returns the encrypted string encoded in BASE64.

Method.name: DecryptString
Method.desc: Decrypts the encrypted string str encoded in BASE64, using the symmetric key key, and returns the string in clear text.

Method.name: RSAEncrypt
Method.desc: Encrypts the string str using the RSA key key and returns it encoded in BASE64.

Method.name: RSADecrypt
Method.desc: Decrypts the BASE64 encrypted string enc using the RSA key key and returns it in clear text

Method.name: setKey
Method.desc: Assigns a copy of the symmetric key to this Encryption object.

Method.name: getEmbeddedKey
Method.desc: Get a copy of the embedded symmetric key that was used in the last decryption operation.

Method.name: setKeyEncryptionKey
Method.desc: Assigns a copy of the key-encryption key to this Encryption object.

Method.name: setCertificate
Method.desc: Assigns a copy of the X509 certificate to this Encryption object.

Method.name: encryptElement
Method.desc: Encrypts the ELEMENT DomNode node and all its children using the symmetric key.

Method.name: decryptElement
Method.desc: Decrypts the EncryptedData DomNode enc using the symmetric key.

Method.name: encryptElementContent
Method.desc: Encrypts all child nodes of the ELEMENT DomNode node using the symmetric key.

Method.name: decryptElementContent
Method.desc: Decrypts the EncryptedData DomNode enc using the symmetric key.

Method.name: encryptElementDetatched
Method.desc: Encrypts the ELEMENT DomNode node and all its children using the symmetric key, and returns them as one new EncryptedData node.

Method.name: decryptElementDetatched
Method.desc: Decrypts the EncryptedData DomNode enc using the symmetric key, and returns it in a new ELEMENT node

Method.name: encryptElementContentDetatched
Method.desc: Encrypts all child nodes of the ELEMENT DomNode node using the symmetric key, and returns them as one new EncryptedData node.

Method.name: decryptElementContentDetatched
Method.desc: Decrypts the EncryptedData DomNode enc using the symmetric key, and returns all its children in one new DOCUMENT_FRAGMENT_NODE node.

Method.name: encryptKey
Method.desc: Encrypts the given symmetric or HMAC key as an EncryptedKey node and returns it as root node of a new XML document.

Method.name: decryptKey
Method.desc: Decrypts the EncryptedKey as root in the given XML document, and returns a new CryptoKey of the given kind.

Method.name: AddTrustedCertificate
Method.desc: Registers the given X509 certificate as a trusted certificate for the application. It will be used for signature verification if no other certificate was set for that purpose.

Method.name: AddCertificate
Method.desc: Registers the given X509 certificate as a certificate for the application. It will be used when an incomplete X509 certificate is detected during signature or encryption to complete the process by checking the certificate issuer name and serial number.

Method.name: AddKey
Method.desc: Registers the given key by name to the application. It is used for XML signature verification or XML decryption when a key name was specified in the XML KeyInfo node and no other key was set in the Signature or Encryption object.

Method.name: CreateUUIDString
Method.desc: Creates a new universal unique identifier (UUID).

Method.name: CreateRandomString
Method.desc: Creates a random base64 string.

Method.name: CreateRandomNumber
Method.desc: Generates a 8-byte strong random number.

Method.name: ToString
Method.desc: Decodes the given base64 string.

Method.name: FromString
Method.desc: Encodes the given string in base64.

Method.name: ToHexBinary
Method.desc: Decodes the given base64 string to hexadecimal.

Method.name: FromHexBinary
Method.desc: Decodes the given hexadecimal string to base64.

Method.name: Xor
Method.desc: Computes the exclusive disjunction between two base64 encoded strings.

Method.name: LoadBinary
Method.desc: Reads data from a file and encodes to base64.

Method.name: SaveBinary
Method.desc: Decodes the given base64 string and writes the data to a file.

Method.name: ToString
Method.desc: Decodes an hexadecimal string to a clear, human-readable string.

Method.name: FromString
Method.desc: Encodes a given string in hexadecimal.

Method.name: ToBase64
Method.desc: Converts an hexadecimal string to the base64 equivalent

Method.name: FromBase64
Method.desc: Converts a base64 string to the hexadecimal equivalent.

Method.name: Xor
Method.desc: Computes the exclusive disjunction between two hexadecimal encoded strings.

Method.name: LoadBinary
Method.desc: Reads binary data from a file and converts it to hexadecimal.

Method.name: SaveBinary
Method.desc: Reads binary data from a file and converts it to hexadecimal.

Method.name: CreateDigest
Method.desc: Defines a new digest context by specifying the algorithm to be used.

Method.name: AddData
Method.desc: Adds a data from a BYTE variable to the digest buffer.

Method.name: AddBase64Data
Method.desc: Adds a data in base64 format to the digest buffer.

Method.name: AddHexBinaryData
Method.desc: Adds a data in hexadecimal format to the digest buffer.

Method.name: AddStringData
Method.desc: Adds a data string to the digest buffer.

Method.name: DoBase64Digest
Method.desc: Creates a digest of the buffered data and returns the result in base64 format.

Method.name: DoHexBinaryDigest
Method.desc: Creates a digest of the buffered data and returns the result in hexadecimal format.

Method.name: CreateDigestString
Method.desc: Creates a SHA1 digest from the given string.
